variables.label: a
variables.name: semimajor axis of elliptic orbit (km)

variables.label: E
variables.name: eccentric anomaly (deg)

variables.label: e
variables.name: eccentricity of orbit (unitless)

variables.label: g₀
variables.name: gravitational constant at Earth's surface (m/s²)

variables.label: i
variables.name: inclination angle of orbital plane (deg)

variables.label: N
variables.name: nodal longitude (longitude of ascending node) (deg)

variables.label: n
variables.name: number of completed orbital passes (count)

variables.label: O
variables.name: latitude (deg)

variables.label: P
variables.name: perigee location in orbital plane (point descriptor)

variables.label: p
variables.name: semilatus rectum of ellipse (km)

variables.label: R
variables.name: radius of Earth (km)

variables.label: r
variables.name: distance of satellite from Earth's center (km)

variables.label: S
variables.name: position of satellite in orbital plane (coordinate)

variables.label: T
variables.name: satellite orbital period (min)

variables.label: t(θ)
variables.name: time from perigee as function of true anomaly θ (min)

variables.label: v
variables.name: satellite velocity (km/s)

variables.label: Vc
variables.name: satellite velocity for circular orbit (km/s)

variables.label: γ
variables.name: elevation angle between local horizon and velocity vector (deg, positive upwards)

variables.label: θ
variables.name: true anomaly (angle in orbital plane from perigee) (deg)

variables.label: k
variables.name: longitude measured east of Greenwich (deg) — base longitude symbol

variables.label: λ
variables.name: longitude measured east of prime meridian at Greenwich (deg)

variables.label: λ_NS
variables.name: difference in longitude between north and south reference points (λ_N - λ_S) (deg)

variables.label: λ_N1
variables.name: difference in longitude between nodal point and reference longitude (λ_N - λ_1) (deg)

variables.label: φ
variables.name: geocentric latitude measured north or south of equator (deg)

variables.label: ψ
variables.name: azimuth angle measured clockwise from North (deg)

variables.label: Ω
variables.name: right ascension of ascending node (rotation of orbital plane about Earth's axis) (deg)

variables.label: ω
variables.name: argument of perigee (angle between nodal point and perigee) (deg)

variables.label: ωₑ
variables.name: angular velocity of the Earth (deg/min)
